comments:
Build 20021127.  

1. Autobuild off.  No JRE specified.  Two projects loaded from CVS.  Search and 
get NPE (see log below).
2. Specify JRE, turn on autobuild, do full build.  Search --> no NPE, but I 
never get any matches.  Tried various search for references.
3. Exited Eclipse, restarted, did same searches as in Step 2 and now they work.
